prompts: Create a shadowy Pokemon that excels in stealth and has a mischievous personality.
Imagine a dark-type Pokemon with long limbs and a sneaky appearance, perfect for surprise attacks.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a unique blend of purple and black colors.
Show me a menacing creature that uses trickery in battles and has a humanoid shape.
Generate a Pokemon with distinct features like sharp claws and a fierce gaze, embodying darkness.
Make a creature that lurks in caves, with a playful yet intimidating nature.
Give me a unique Pokemon design that emphasizes agility and cunning in combat.
